mapper.insert:
insert into ems_user(number, username, password, salt, classes, sex, origin, phone, email, political, address, college, major) VALUES
(#{user.number},#{user.username},#{user.password},#{user.salt},(select id from ems_classes where ems_classes.name = #{user.classes}),#{user.sex},#{user.origin},#{user.phone},#{user.email},#{user.political},#{user.address},(select id from ems_college where name = #{user.college}),(select id from ems_major where ems_major.major_name = #{user.major}))

insert into ems_user(number, username, password, salt, sex, phone, email, political, address, college) VALUES
(#{user.number},#{user.username},#{user.password},#{user.salt},#{user.sex},#{user.phone},#{user.email},#{user.political},#{user.address},(select id from ems_college where name = #{user.college}))
mapper.select: select username from ems_user where username like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')
select username from ems_user left join ems_user_role eur on ems_user.id = eur.user_id where eur.role_id = 3 and username like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')
